data.title: Rome, Italy -- M.B. Olivieri to Ferdinando Sabalot di Preti in Florence thanking him for translations into Hebrew by Pietro Bandini of Credo, Pater Noster and Ave Maria, praises translation, makes cor
data.text: This collection is open for research. However, certain items have been restricted due to preservation issues that do not allow the items to be handled. The restrictions will be lifted once preservation work has been completed.
